mapper.insert: insert into teach( teach_name , prepare_lessons_time , course , grade, student_name, lessons_time , teach_topic , teach_type, teach_source , student_questions , teach_goal , teach_key_difficulty , review , key_point, senior_question_ids , conclude, consolidate, consolidate_question_ids, node )values ( #{teachName}, #{prepareLessonsTime}, #{course}, #{grade}, #{studentName}, #{lessonsTime}, #{teachTopic} , #{teachType}, #{teachSource} , #{studentQuestions} , #{teachGoal} , #{teachKeyDifficulty} , #{review} , #{keyPoint}, #{seniorQuestionIds} , #{conclude}, #{consolidate}, #{consolidateQuestionIds}, #{node} )

insert into teach_points( teach_id, points, analyse, points_question_ids )values
( #{TeachPoints.teachId}, #{TeachPoints.points}, #{TeachPoints.analyse}, #{TeachPoints.pointsQuestionIds} )

insert into teach_practice( teach_id, week, practice_question_ids, signature )values
( #{TeachPractice.teachId}, #{TeachPractice.week}, #{TeachPractice.practiceQuestionIds}, #{TeachPractice.signature} )
mapper.delete: delete from personal where user_id = #{userId} and teach_id = #{teachId}
mapper.select: select points, analyse, points_question_ids pointsQuestionIds from teach_points where teach_id = #{id}
select week, signature, practice_question_ids practiceQuestionIds from teach_practice where teach_id = #{id}
